posts.title: Bicycling Rear View Radar
posts.content: Avoid becoming roadkill as you ride through the streets by outfitting your bicycle with this rear view radar. This revolutionary device wirelessly integrates with compatible Edge cycling computers and warns you of approaching cars from up to 150 yards.

posts.title: Robotic Pool Cleaner
posts.content: Keep your swimming hole in pristine diving conditions year-round by placing this robotic pool cleaner on the job. It comes with a convenient cartridge filter system that’s easy to clean and is designed to scrub, vacuum, and filter the entire pool in just three hours.

posts.title: Grid-It Organizer
posts.content: Keep all your devices visible and at hand when you need them by storing them in one of these Grid-It organizers. The rubberized woven straps help keep all types of gear and gadgets firmly in place while allowing for endless storage configurations.

posts.title: Cake Pop Molds
posts.content: Create professional looking treats for any event in the comfort of your own kitchen with these cake pop molds. These compact ball shaped molds require absolutely no baking and create delicious cake pops you can decorate and sprinkle with your favorite toppings.

posts.title: Amazon Oasis Waterproof Kindle
posts.content: Say goodbye to soggy pages when reading poolside by upgrading to the Amazon Oasis waterproof Kindle. It features an ultra slim and lightweight design, a battery that lasts for weeks at a time, a large 7 inch glare-free display, and up to 32 GB of storage.

posts.title: One-Step Tie-Dye Kit
posts.content: This one-step tie-dye kit makes creating gorgeous hippie-chic shirts so easy that anyone can do it. The kit comes with 18 easy-squeeze bottles filled with all the classic colors – simply add water in order to create fabulous shirts.

posts.title: Snowball Slingshot
posts.content: Be prepared for an all out snowball war this winter with this snowball slingshot that also functions as a perfect snowball maker. Capable of launching a snowball 80 feet in distance, this heavy duty slingshot will easily make you top dog of the winter snowball battles.

posts.title: Bacon Flavored Microwave Popcorn
posts.content: Two of mankind’s greatest foods have finally joined forces to improve the movie-watching experience. Every gluttonous kernel of the bacon flavored microwave popcorn comes bathed with an intoxicating aroma that’ll make anyone salivate.

posts.title: Fruit Infuser Water Bottle
posts.content: Steer clear of artificial sweeteners and preservatives by improving your water’s taste the natural way with this fruit infuser water bottle. This leak-proof 24-ounce capacity bottle comes with a removable infuser that you can fill with your favorite fruity ingredients.

posts.title: Double Dish Snack Bowl
posts.content: Enjoy snacking on shelled nuts without leaving a mess behind by serving them in this double dish snack bowl. The dual layer design allows you to hide the pits and shells underneath the serving bowl so they remain out of sight until you’re ready to throw them out.

posts.title: Half Pint Beer Glass
posts.content: No self respecting beer lover’s home bar would be complete without a few of these half pint beer glasses. It can hold up to 8.4 ounces and features a long slender design that will make them a sure-fire conversation piece with all your drinking buddies.

posts.title: Backyard Slackline
posts.content: Work on your balancing skills from the comfort of home with the backyard slackline. Once the slackline is fastened at both ends, you’ll have a rigid yet flexible rope that will allow you to perform tricks or just work on your balance.
